subject: Dear Carole
body:
Good Day,

My name is Dr Kwon Hyuk-bin, Executive Director of (Dmetec Co., Ltd.)
from South Korea. I hope this message finds you well. My company has a
lucrative proposal for you. We came across your profile on LinkedIn
and my company wishes to come down to South Africa for the purchase of
a raw material called =(DOLOMITE)= with our (company funds).
Therefore, we want to know if you are capable of representing my
Company in South Africa while your interest will be protected. Kindly
indicate your interest by returning a message for more details.

I wait for your quick reply,
Best regards,
Dr Kwon
Executive Director

subject: Re: Dear Carole
body:
Hello Dr. Kwon,

Thank you for reaching out with your proposal regarding the purchase of raw material. I am interested in learning more about this opportunity. Could you please provide further details on the specifics of the proposal and how my involvement would be beneficial?

Looking forward to your response.

Best wishes,
Carole

subject: Re: Dear Carole
body:
Good day,

Following our previous communications for a mutual business relationship
and your interest in working out this business with us. Please take your
time to read below the business proposal. As a leading pharmaceutical
manufacturing company based in South Korea, we specialize in producing
advanced hospital equipment and devices and Drugs.

The proposal is of two segments;
(1). We are proposing to open a pharmaceutical equipment factory in South
Africa. Therefore, I am soliciting for you to be our company representative
in South Africa to help us achieve these projects as we have not been to
South Africa before.

(2). But before the factory which is the second project, we wish to come
down to South Africa for purchase of a raw material called =(GASPEITE)=
with Chemical formula Ni,Mg,Fe2+)CO3 95% Purity grade A green gem mineral
in color Description. We are buying WITH OUR COMPANY FUNDS. The product is
being used as supplementary raw material in our medical devices production.

Roles, Procedures & Benefits:
If you help us to secure the negotiation and purchase of this particular
product, you will earn a facilitation 7% commission of the total purchase
value of the raw material we wish to buy. We are hoping to buy 8,000 units
of (GASPEITE) at a prevailing international market price of $2,000 USD per
unit. And we shall be purchasing these products every four months interval
through you for three years subject to renewal depending on your
performance.

However, we have a recommended local mining company in South Africa. The
company was recommended to us from the economic desk of your country South
Africa High Commission here in South Korea.

Therefore, we want to know if you are capable of representing my Company
over there. With utmost good faith I solemnly declare that this business is
risk free.

Point For Actions:
 If we are of mutual interest, we shall come with a company Memorandum of
Agreement (MOU) for your official endorsement and authenticity between my
company (HANMI PHARMACEUTICALS CO LTD. South Korea) and your humble self.
Below is the recommended mining company in South Africa.

------------------------------ -----------
BEKERS MINERALS MINING COMPANY
12 Pat Harrison Rd, Musina,
Tel:+27 81 554 0829
Fax:+27 86 867 6287
Contact person: Engr.Gary Lucas ( Sales Manager)
Email: garylucas@bekersmineralsmining.com
Email: info@bekersmineralsmining.com
https://bekersmineralsmining.com
------------------------------ -------------------------
Project Plans:

Note; after the successful purchase of these products for the first time,
then the building of Medical Equipment factory will commence, thereafter,
our Board of Directors will be in South Africa (by end of Mar, 2024) to
have a meeting with you for the feasibility plans on how to build the
factory in South Africa which you will be the sole supervision and sole
representative in African Continent. Also, a perfect enumeration will be
drawn in that respect once the factory is established.

I expect your quick reply,
Best regards,
Dr Jae-Hyeon Park
Chief Executive Officer
Hanmi Pharmaceuticals Co Ltd
Tel: +82 31 3505600
Fax: +82-31-356-5151
214, Muha-Ro, Paltan-Myeon,
Hwaseong, Seoul, 18536
www.hanmi.co.kr

subject: Re: Dear Carole
body:
Hello,

Thank you for sharing this business proposal with me. I appreciate your interest in expanding your operations to South Africa and potentially working together on this project.

Could you provide more details about the specific role and responsibilities you envision for me as your company representative in South Africa? Additionally, I would like to know more about the commission structure and any other benefits associated with assisting in the purchase of GASPEITE.

Looking forward to hearing back from you soon.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Carole

subject: Re: Dear Carole
body:
Good day,

Kindly note, we want to know if this raw material is available in South
Africa and the current selling price before MOU can be sent to you.place a
call across to the Mining company to confirm the following:

1.The availability of the product
2.The current selling price
3.The quantity in stock.

I wait for your quick reply,
Best regards,
Dr Jae-Hyeon Park

subject: Re: Dear Carole
body:
Hello Dr. Park, thank you for reaching out. I can help you with that information. Could you please provide more details about the raw material you are looking for? What specific product are you interested in and how much quantity do you require? Once I have this information, I will be able to assist you further.

Best wishes,
Carole

subject: Re: Dear Carole
body:
Good day,

We are very happy to have your contact again with a positive response. We
wish to come down to South Africa for purchase of a raw material called
=(GASPEITE)= with Chemical formula Ni,Mg,Fe2+)CO3 95% Purity grade A green
gem mineral in color Description.

We are hoping to buy 8,000 units of (GASPEITE) at a prevailing
international market price of $2,000 USD per unit. And we shall be
purchasing these products every four months interval through you for three
years subject to renewal depending on your performance.

Go ahead and speak with the mining company and make the required details
available, the entire Board are waiting to hear from you.

I expect your quick reply,
Best regards,
Dr Kwon
Chief Executive Officer

subject: Re: Dear Carole
body:
Hello Dr. Kwon,

Thank you for reaching out with this opportunity to purchase GASPEITE. I'm interested in learning more about the product and the potential business partnership. Could you provide more details on the quality of the GASPEITE, the quantity you are looking to purchase, and any specific requirements or terms for the transactions?

Looking forward to your response.

Best wishes,
Carole

subject: Re: Dear Carole
body:
Good day,

The entire Board members are however very worried because of the slowness
in your contact to the mining company and we do not have the luxury of
time. My company is under intense pressure, the Canadian government with
whom we have a 3 years contract to produce advanced Hospital Equipment have
given us 2 weeks ultimatum to commence production or risk losing our 3
years contract with them.

If you are not interested in contacting the mining company and confirm the
availability of the product and the current selling price you are free to
call it quits by advising us speedily to seek someone that has the ability
to carry the purchase to land light.

      EVERYTHING YOU NEED TO KNOW ABOUT THE PRODUCT AND THE TRANSACTIONS IS
ON BELOW MESSAGE

Email: garylucas@bekersmineralsmining.com

I expect your quick reply,
Best regards,
Dr Jae-Hyeon Park
Chief Executive Officer

subject: Re: Dear Carole
body:
Hello,

Thank you for sharing this information with me. I appreciate the opportunity to potentially be involved in such a business venture. Could you provide more details about the specific role and responsibilities I would have as your company's representative in South Africa? Additionally, what steps would need to be taken to ensure a smooth and successful partnership between our companies?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Carole

subject: Re: Dear Carole
body:
Hello! How can I help you today?

Best wishes,
Carole
